original: @35a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @35a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /
translated: Prajñāpāramitā Sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub @35b thabs /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub @35b thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining Prajñāpāramitā

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Prajñāpāramitā!

original: gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely meditating on her,

original: shes rab pha rol phyin bskyed cing //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin bskyed cing //
translated: Prajñāpāramitā is generated,

original: gzhan rtsod kun las rgyal 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gzhan rtsod kun las rgyal 'gyur ba //
translated: And one becomes victorious over all disputes with others.

original: de ni yang dag bshad par bya //
analyzed: de ni yang dag bshad par bya //
translated: This should be explained properly.

original: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
translated: One face, two arms,

original: mdog ni dkar po yid du 'ong //
analyzed: mdog ni dkar po yid du 'ong //
translated: White in color, pleasing,

original: phyed phyed 'khyil pa'i dbu skra dang // padma dkar por yang dag gnas //
analyzed: phyed phyed 'khyil pa'i dbu skra dang // padma dkar por yang dag gnas //
translated: With half-up-do hair, perfectly abiding on a white lotus,

original: g-yas kyi phyag na padma ste //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag na padma ste //
translated: In the right hand a lotus,

original: g-yon na shes rab pha rol phyin //
analyzed: g-yon na shes rab pha rol phyin //
translated: In the left the Prajñāpāramitā,

original: mdog dmar rnam par bsgom par bya //
analyzed: mdog dmar rnam par bsgom par bya //
translated: Red in color, one should meditate.

original: rdo rje skyil krung yang dag gnas //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung yang dag gnas //
translated: Perfectly abiding in vajra posture,

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis yan lag brgyan //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis yan lag brgyan //
translated: Adorned with all ornaments on the limbs,

original: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//
analyzed: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//
translated: One should meditate on the navel cakra.

original: aam yig ye shes las byung ba //
analyzed: aam yig ye shes las byung ba //
translated: Arisen from the wisdom syllable aṃ,

original: mchog dang dga' bar byed pa mo //
analyzed: mchog dang dga' bar byed pa mo //
translated: The supreme and delightful one.

original: dam tshig sems dpa' rdzogs byas la //
analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa' rdzogs byas la //
translated: Having completed the pledge being,

original: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on the wisdom being.

original: zla drug bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: zla drug bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the yoga of meditating for six months,

original: shes rab pha rol phyin mar 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin mar 'gyur //
translated: One will become the perfection of wisdom.

original: nub bdun bar du sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: nub bdun bar du sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the yoga of seven sunsets,

original: bstan bcos kun la 'jigs pa med //
analyzed: bstan bcos kun la 'jigs pa med //
translated: One will be fearless in all treatises.

original: 'bum phrag bzlas pa sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'bum phrag bzlas pa sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the yoga of reciting one hundred thousand times,🔽One will effortlessly recite

original: nyin re tshigs bcad brgya brgya ni //🔽'bad pa med par rab tu byed //
analyzed: nyin re tshigs bcad brgya brgya ni // 'bad pa med par rab tu byed //
translated: One hundred verses every day.

original: gzhung ni brgya ni 'dzin par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhung ni brgya ni 'dzin par 'gyur //
translated: One will memorize one hundred texts.

original: de la sngags kyi tshig ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la sngags kyi tshig ni 'di yin te /
translated: The mantra words for that are:

original: aom pi tsu pi tsu pra dzny'a bardha ni dzva la dzva la me dh'a bar dh'a ni /
analyzed: aom pi tsu pi tsu pra dzny'a bardha ni dzva la dzva la me dh'a bar dh'a ni /
translated: Oṃ picu picu prajñāvardhani jvala jvala medhāvardhani

original: dhi ri dhi ri budhi bar dha ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: dhi ri dhi ri budhi bar dha ni sv'a h'a /
translated: dhi ri dhiri budhivardhani svāhā.

original: bya rog gi sgra mi grag bar sngags 'dis ma bslangs par rang skyur la /
analyzed: bya rog gi sgra mi grag bar sngags 'dis ma bslangs par rang skyur la /
translated: Without the sound of crows, one should not request this mantra, but let it come forth naturally.

original: lan bdun du bsngags la /
analyzed: lan bdun du bsngags la /
translated: Recite it seven times.

original: ji srid zla ba drug gi bar du 'thungs na de'i shes rab skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid zla ba drug gi bar du 'thungs na de'i shes rab skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one drinks it for six months, one's wisdom will increase.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub ba'i thabs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub ba'i thabs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so //
translated: The method of accomplishing Prajñāpāramitā, taught by the Buddha, is complete.

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
translated: Translated and revised by the paṇḍita Amoghavajra and the Khotanese monk-translator Vairocanarakṣita.
